price: Na tuliwafanya ni waongozi waitao kwenye Moto. Na Siku ya Kiyama hawatanusuriwa.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu amesema: Na tukawafanya hao ni wenye kuitia watu kwenye ukafiri, ambao khatima yake ni Moto. Na Siku ya Kiyama hawampati wa kuwanusuru na kuwatoa kwenye adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yadʿūna ilā al-nāri wayawma al-qiyāmati lā yunṣarūna
